Subject: Gabriel arrives at the ark.

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Gabriel arrrived at the ark. He looked around. He saw the entire outside of 
the ark had been completed. He saw Magnus come up behind him. He must have 
followed him and not noticed. He looked at Magnus. "Let us finish our plans." 
he said it quitly enough so no one else would here. He then turned back to 
the working bots.."Bots here me. The alliance is destroying time. He showed a 
hologram which was huge. It showed a picture of the alliance leader Zardus(if 
this is wrong correct me.) "If we allow them to continue my world will be 
destroyed. In my future there is peace and prosperty. Until there was a time 
ripe. Suddenly  all the maximals turned into drones. Mindless metal 
skeletons. I was able to escape through a vortex. If zardus is allowed to 
live then we shall all parish. Including everyone on cybertron."
  He sent a coded mess to destructor.. "I have told them. I do not know if 
they bielieve me. But hopefully they will aid us."
   Magnus looked at the hologram. "Maximals...Destrons Predacons...let us 
join forces once more. So that we may save all of time."
